title: Have A Peacemaker's Heart | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Have A Peacemaker's Heart | Victoria Osteen
description:
We all have the ability to create peace in our lives. When you make the decision not to step into strife and division, you are choosing to honor God. Because Jesus created peace for us, we can trust Him to fight our battles for us.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
